item.description:
Wildfire is a great rock and roll band, and T.P.s Scoreboard is right off the highway, in Woburn, not far from route 93.  It takes me under 40 minutes from pelham, NH. 

For those of you that want to eat, plan on being there by 7:30, and let me know in your response.

If you get there later, see you on the dance floor, once the band starts...

 

please rsvp for dinner ;)
item.why: this is a great band and an even greater venue...they are soooo accommodating to out infamous meetup group ;)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Wildfire at TP's Scoreboard...
